sourcesContent:
<template>
  <Title :title="title" />
  <Cart />
</template>

<script>
import Cart from "../components/Cart.vue";
import Title from "../components/Title.vue";

export default {
  name: "CartPage",
  components: {
    Title,
    Cart,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      title: "Cart",
      cart: 0,
    };
  },
};
</script>
